info.name: LinkedIn Minimal
info.description: A Minimal theme for LinkedIn. If you use LinkedIn on a daily basis and want to read posts better this is a clean theme that makes Linkedin enjoyable for you! You can use this theme for LinkedIn with Stylish or Stylus extension in any browser. Source code available on Github. Reach me on twitter @_pooya.
